import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/fake-logo.svg' import { HeaderContainer, OptionsContainer } from './header.styles' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => ( Shop Contact { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()} > Sign Out
) : ( Sign In ) } ) const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
